mapper.select: select * from ( select * from staff_table where id = #{id}) staff left join rights_table rights on staff.rightsId = rights.id
mapper.insert: insert into staff_table ( username, password, real_name, `key`, role_id,intro,zaishoku,avatar ) values ( #{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{key}, #{rolesId},#{intro},#{zaishoku},#{avatar})
mapper.update: update staff_table set username =ifnull(#{staff.username}, username), password=ifnull(#{staff.password},password ), real_name=ifnull(#{staff.realName}, real_name), `key`=ifnull(#{staff.keyTime},`key` ), role_id=ifnull(#{staff.rolesId}, role_id), intro= ifnull(#{staff.intro}, intro), zaishoku= ifnull(#{staff.zaishoku},zaishoku ), avatar = ifnull(#{staff.avatar}, avatar ) where staff_id = #{id}
